description: Pro-Kremlin United Russia dominates the vote, but loses its majority in two Siberian cities.
title: Russian opposition makes gains in local elections
title_page: Russian opposition makes gains in local elections - BBC News
maintext: Most results in the elections have now been counted. But there have been many reports of irregularities. The independent monitoring group Golos said observers had been obstructed by officials at some polling stations and there were reports of ballot-stuffing.
